item.title: Engineered To Purpose
item.description:
About This Game

Engineered To Purpose is a narratively-driven sci-fi tower defence game which allows players to design their own towers, customising attacks, targeting schemes, and more. As pressure mounts, plan out and optimise your defences in order to defeat hordes of enemies!

Tower Design



Our design system is based on combining sets of components and then assigning modifiers to the attack to customise each tower into a unique form and effect. The system allows you to use your unlocked components to build and experiment, adding a new layer of strategy to the tower defence formula.



Designing a tower can be done mid-level if you have enough room, or between levels in our workshop, where towers can be tested against any enemy you have encountered, and you can see the effect of your choices in real-time.



Key Demo Features:
  • Design your towers!
  • Face hordes of unique and challenging enemies!
  • Test your towers in the Workshop to prepare for missions!
  • The first chapter of our story-driven campaign!

Coming Soon!
  • Three more worlds: more story, more enemy types, more tower components, and more maps!
  • Over 100 enemy types!
  • Gameplay Modifiers, allowing you to customise the challenges you face per level and adding deep replay options for even the simplest map!
  • Post-game advancement - Once the campaign is complete, continue to collect new components and upgrade your collection!

item.title: Outpost: Infinity Siege
item.description:
About This Game

Outpost Building

Explore the world, gather resources, merge and upgrade outpost units to build your own outpost.

Unique Weapon

Fully exploit the value of the unique XEN Firearm with different protoslag attributes, and utilize ammunition with diverse performance.

Loot & Farm

Enjoy the abundant difficulty levels, diverse gameplay features, and distinctive maps of the exploration mode. Venture deep into the brand new zones full of hazards and opportunities, and harvest powerful outpost units.

Co-op Feature

Fight alongside friends on Recovery Day, or strive together to survive infinite waves of monsters in Endless mode till the last moment.

item.title: Appetit MR
item.description:
About This Software

Bon Appetit!

Appetit is your ultimate Mixed Reality virtual cooking assistant to help you in all your culinary ventures, small or large! Have recipes suggested to you, search for and create custom recipes that fit your needs and preferences, order ingredients online, adjust the recipe's difficulty and complexity and more! Appetit has your back in the kitchen.

item.title: Nine Lives Ninja: Explore!
item.description:
About This Game

Nine Lives Ninja: Explore lets you take control of a cat (who also happens to be a ninja) as they explore an ancient cave system searching for the Fountain of Kitty Youth - the only way to restore their lost lives. How did the cat become a ninja? Aren't all their lost lives directly due to the dangers of the cave? Fantastic questions! For now let us simply join the intrepid ninja (who also happens to be a cat) and help them reach their goal.

Nine Lives Ninja: Explore is a platformer with metroidvania elements. It features multiple game modes, retro-pixel graphics, tight controls, collectibles, and achievements to uncover.

item.title: Hero's black dungeon
item.description:
About This Game

Hero's black dungeon is a 2D action roguelike. Take control of a young adventurer who travels to the Mediterranean lands in search of adventure and glory. On your way you will meet quite a few enemies and interesting characters. Arm yourself with magical blades and chop down enemies on your way! Complete tasks, collect resources and go deeper and deeper through the floors!

In the game you have to clear locations from enemies, complete your goals and go deeper into the dungeon.

Are you ready to become a real hero and explore dark dungeons while fighting the forces of evil? Then go on a journey with a young adventurer and test yourself!

Game Features:
- Pixel graphics
- Various enemies
- Good soundtrack

item.title: Exit: Left or Right
item.description:
About This Game

You've entered liminal space. It's a strange, empty world outside of our reality. Sometimes, some people end up here, and you are one of them. Now, you need to find a way out. There will always be two different paths in front of you, left or right. One of the paths will lead you to the exit, and the other will lead you to death. You have to scrutinize your surroundings to choose the right path.

Gameplay


Exit Left or Right is a short walking simulator inspired by liminal spaces. There is no fast-paced action or pathos story in this game. All you need is just to choose the right way to go. You need to scrutinize your surroundings, because you can always notice something strange in front of the wrong door...

Keep an eye on your surroundings, don't overlook any oddities.

If you find anomalies, turn back immediately.

If you don't find any anomalies, go forward.

Your goal is to get to the exit.

item.title: SOUTH PARK: SNOW DAY!
item.description:
About This Game

From South Park Digital Studios, the studio that brought you South Park: The Stick of Truth, South Park: The Fractured but Whole, and South Park: Phone Destroyer comes the next chapter in the journey of the New Kid.

Join Cartman, Stan, Kyle, and Kenny, in three-dimensional glory, to celebrate the most magical day in any young child’s life - a snow day! A massive blizzard has thrown the town into chaos and, more importantly, canceled school.

Play with up to three friends, use matchmaking, or solo the game with ally bots and battle through the snow-piled town of South Park. Engage in frenetic, action-packed combat against warring factions in an all-new story where you make the rules. Equip unique weapons and deploy devastating, upgradable special abilities on a new adventure to save the world and enjoy a day without school.

It’s a snow day, dude!


  • Battle your way through the snow-covered town of South Park in this all-new 3D co-op game.
  • A blizzard of epic proportions has blanketed the town of South Park and it’s up to Cartman, Stan, Kenny, Kyle, and you, as the New Kid, to save the town from an endless winter.
  • Experience cooperative gameplay for the first time ever in a South Park game with up to three friends or ally bots - unleashing powerful, coordinated attacks on your foes.
  • Equip and upgrade devastating melee and ranged weapons. Deploy special abilities and powers that will bring hordes of enemies and epic bosses to their knees.
  • Use a wide range of iconic cosmetics and customize your New Kid with endless possible combinations from beanies to Cheesy Poof T-shirts to chin balls.

item.title: Wrestling Cardboard Championship
item.description:
About This Game

A game experience inspired by wrestling, making use of simulated physics, cardboard boxes with unique skills and movements, fight in large arenas based on arenas that have marked wrestling, such as Madison Square Garden, Arena México and Tokyo Dome.

A new wrestling company has been born, offering a unique show around the world, different fighting styles and extremely skilled fighters ready to give it their all in the ring. The Wrestling Cardboard Championship gives all kinds of cardboard boxes the opportunity to show that they are the strongest and that they have the talent to entertain the people.


Experience different game modes for up to 4 players: 1 vs 1, 2 vs 2, 3 vs 1 and All vs All


The Normal Box is in its last days of useful life, after knowing what its cruel destiny would be, being crushed and recycled, it decides to change it for wrestling, arriving at the WCC in search of an opportunity and showing that his passion can take him to the top, although you will soon realize that being a professional wrestler is not an easy thing.


12 unique boxes with varied fighting styles, inspired by well-known brands and professional wrestlers. Each Box has its own theme song and its own personality.


Inspired by real settings such as Madison Square Garden, Hammerstein Ballroom, Arena Mexico and Tokyo Dome. (Adding more post launch scenarios via DLC)

item.title: Hamburg: 'Neue Burg' VR
item.description:
About This Game

Immerse yourself in over 1000 years of Hamburg's history and experience the beginnings of the city in 1024! The 'Neue Burg' - the nucleus of Hamburg's early 'New Town' - has been reconstructed in great detail in collaboration with archaeologists. This immersive Virtual Reality experience offers 22 interactive stations that invite you to discover and understand the history of Hamburg.

Climb the castle walls and ship masts, jump back in time and compare then and now, collect parts of a painting to create a portrait of the Duke of the castle and explore models that visualize the 1000-year urban development of this place. You can follow the fully audio-guided tour or explore the entire area freely.

'Hamburg: Neue Burg VR' was developed as part of a PhD project and aims to use the potential of VR to convey history in a playful way.

VR hardware necessary! Tested on HTC Vive Pro, Valve Index, Oculus Quest 2 & Pico 4

item.title: 3D Chess Q14
item.description:
About This Game

Extended Chess Game with additional optional figures.
  • The user can play on Boards with 6-by-6 to 16-by-16 fields.
  • Up to 3 new Figures: Wizard, Gamma and Keeper
  • More than 70 play modes: Single Layer, 3D Stacked Game, Random Attack Games, and Tower Challenge.
  • 3D view 2D projection.
  • Play on the same computer, online with your friends or against the AI.
  • Anti-Chess support for all single-level games
  • 3D Stacked: Play on several levels: Each hit figure will be your trophy on the next level. Since a level is done (check or draw), the game continues on the next level.
  • Tower Mode: Play several sized games. The best player wins.
  • Online: Play against other online users
  • Quick Game: Attach to a random online game.
  • Snapshots: Create a game snapshot and replay any time.
  • Switch between different visualizations. Board Style, Darkmode, Fullsized Windows, hint fields

item.title: Go Fight Fantastic
item.description:
About This Game

Go Fight Fantastic is a 1-3 player hack n’ slash starring a crew of interstellar smugglers, led by their space-dog captain Bowie. When they stumble into an invasion during a mission to Bird Planet, they become the only hope of this once peaceful world.

Team up in co-op (local and online) or switch between the different characters on-the-fly in solo play.

Story Mode

Fast-paced. Light-hearted. Vibrantly hand-drawn. Fight across treacherous marshlands, steep summits and picturesque settlements and meet an imaginative cast of friends and foes along the way. A unique touch is added to each playthrough by a degree of randomized level composition, enemy encounters, and upgrade drops.

Horde Mode

Fire up captain Bowie’s combat simulator and plow through an endless alien assault to climb the online leaderboards! Use the strengths of all your characters to prevail, pick powerups between the waves, and repeat. The longer you stay alive, the more challenging it gets.


Build Your Crew

Play as four different characters, each representing their own playstyle, and tailor them with persistent Meteorite upgrades found throughout the game. Want a Healer who can deal some serious damage? Or a Striker with poisonous blades? Have at it!

Join the Community

Join our official Discord Server and let us know what you think of the game! Come hang out, join contests and get the latest news about the development.

https://discord.gg/GoFightFantastic/

item.description:
About This Game

OG Puzzlers: Synthwave Monsters is an puzzel game with scary monsters in an stunning synthwave style. You have to assemble a single image from random generated indivdual pieces.
Combine all of the smart singel frames into one big image and unlock the next level.

features:

  • 11 Levels
  • puzzle adventure
  • auto saving
  • simple mouse control
  • 100 steam awards

item.description:
About This Game

I thought it was just an ordinary day, but I accidentally entered this endless cycle of rooms.
Among the countless terrifying and anomalous things, there is a girl who seems like she shouldn't exist here.
--------------------------

item.title: BouncingBalls
item.description:
About This Game

This game is an aim trainer implemented in a playful way.
You find yourself in a kind of laboratory box where balls fall from the sky and bounce off walls and fly around the room unpredictably and these balls have to be shot.
However, it won't be easy, so get started and set an incredible high score!
